article_title: Is Too Much Insurance Killing The American Health System

article_metadata.description: In a 2009 Atlantic article titled How American Healthcare Killed My Father,  and in a 2013 book titled Catastrophic Care, David Goldhill blames the high cost and low quality of medical care in the U.S. on our overly generous health insurance system, “the costliest way of financing our spending.”  Goldhill [...]
article_metadata.author: Peter Ubel
